heroes.name: npc_dota_hero_troll_warlord
heroes.bio_loc:
激怒巨魔是非常轻松的一件事情。巨魔这个种族的特点是容易动怒，喜爱争斗，靠着争吵和打架度日，不会错过任何话茬扯着嗓门与人争辩。男性巨魔在女族长的统治下在地下洞穴长到成年，终日饭来张口，游手好闲。通常在成年后他们还会待上数年，女族长继续负责他们的吃喝拉撒。当年轻的巨魔最终离开地下的洞穴时，他们会找到同类三两成群，组成团伙四处游荡，高声抱怨各种琐事。

既然巨魔生性爱吵架，可以想象下一只巨魔因为太难相处被族人赶走是件多么稀罕的事。比如巨魔战将的经历，来自霍文林地深处的巨魔商人。他听不得他人的三言两语，说话又十分刻薄粗暴，即使是其他巨魔也发现难以与他相处。特别是有一次劫掠后他一个劲地数落同伴的不是，把大部分战利品都霸占了，他的同伴们终于忍无可忍。他们把矛头都指向他，用棍棒痛扁了一顿，还把他赶出了露营聚集地。他因为这次驱逐暴跳如雷，第二天回去的时候已经全副武装，一个接一个地把同伴杀光。接着他立下血誓：此后成为一支战斗力量为自己卖命。现在他以巨魔战将的称号在世界上游荡，言语尖酸，动作凶猛，作为一支单兵军队高高在上的得力战将。
heroes.hype_loc: 巨魔战将可以在近战和远程攻击之间切换自如，无论远近他都是强大的力量。有着双斧在手，他的出击往往伴随着风暴般的旋刃。敌人很难抵挡他愈发迅捷的攻击，而他无论身在何方都可以帮助盟友发动猛击。
heroes.npe_desc_loc: 随意在远程和近战攻击之间切换

abilities.name: troll_warlord_switch_stance
abilities.desc_loc: Troll Warlord swaps from using ranged to melee attacks. Melee attacks have decreased base attack time.

abilities.name: troll_warlord_whirling_axes_ranged
abilities.desc_loc: Troll hurls a fistful of five axes in a cone shape over %axe_range% range, slowing and damaging enemy units.
abilities.lore_loc: Only axes fueled by hate whirl with such a deadly spin.
notes_loc: Does not trigger spell block or spell reflect.
abilities.scepter_loc:
Causes Whirling Axes (Ranged) to dispel enemies. Reduces cooldown and mana cost.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel

abilities.name: troll_warlord_whirling_axes_melee
abilities.desc_loc: Troll hurls two axes around him in a close range area of effect, damaging enemy units and causing them to miss some attacks.
abilities.scepter_loc:
Causes Whirling Axes (Melee) to dispel Troll Warlord. Reduces cooldown and mana cost.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel

abilities.name: troll_warlord_fervor
abilities.desc_loc: With each continuous blow on the same target, Troll gains increased attack speed.  If Troll changes targets, the stacks drop to zero.
abilities.lore_loc: If at first you don't succeed, strike, strike again.
notes_loc: Break disables the gaining of new stacks.
Break disables the proc chance granted by Aghanim's Shard.
abilities.shard_loc: Grants Troll %base_chance%%% + %extra_attack_chance_per_stack%%% chance per Fervor stack of firing an additional ranged attack to any unit within its ranged attack range plus %range_buffer% when attacking an enemy unit.
facets_loc: Fervor grants armor per stack while in melee form.

abilities.name: troll_warlord_berserkers_rage
abilities.desc_loc:
While in melee form, Troll Warlord's attacks have a chance to ensnare, preventing the target from moving or using mobility spells and has additional movement speed and armor.

When in ranged form, Troll Warlord's attacks have a chance to Maim the target, dealing bonus damage, and slowing the target's movement and attack speed.
abilities.lore_loc: Like his anger, Troll Warlord's supply of axes is infinite.
notes_loc: Cooldowns of items that are different for ranged and melee units will be based on which form Troll Warlord was in when the item was used.

abilities.name: troll_warlord_battle_trance
abilities.desc_loc:
Troll unleashes a powerful battle trance, that forces you to continuously attack the closest enemy unit within %range% range, prioritizing heroes. Damage does not kill you during this mode. Grants you bonus lifesteal, attack speed and movement speed. Applies a Basic Dispel.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel
abilities.lore_loc: An adrenaline rush of pure hatred quickens your blades.
notes_loc: Troll can still use his items and abilities while affected by Battle Trance, but not other commands.
Troll can still be killed with Axe's Culling Blade.
Troll is granted vision over the target.
abilities.shard_loc: Casting Battle Trance now gives Troll Warlord a global aura that gives allied heroes (including himself) +60 Attack Speed.
facets_loc: During Battle Trance, Troll Warlord has increased max Fervor stacks and no attack speed limit. Battle Trance grants allied heroes %attack_speed_share_percent%%% of the attack speed bonus.

talents.name: special_bonus_unique_troll_warlord_4
talents.desc_loc: Can be cast while stunned and applies a strong dispel to Troll Warlord.

facets.description_loc: Fervor grants armor per stack while in melee form.
facets.name: troll_warlord_insensitive

facets.description_loc: During Battle Trance, Troll Warlord has increased max Fervor stacks and no attack speed limit. Battle Trance grants allied heroes {s:bonus_attack_speed_share_percent}% of the attack speed bonus.
facets.name: troll_warlord_bad_influence

new_abilities.name: troll_warlord_switch_stance
new_abilities.desc_loc: Troll Warlord swaps from using ranged to melee attacks. Melee attacks have decreased base attack time.
